servo demodulator.description: {"component": "servo demodulator", "inputs": [{"line": "Signal From Read Head", "connected_to": "Read Head", "connection_point": "Read Head signal output"}], "outputs": [{"line": "Demodulated Signal", "connected_to": "A/D", "connection_point": "A/D analog input"}]}

A/D converter.description: {"component": "A/D converter", "inputs": [{"line": "Analog signal input", "connected_to": "Servo Demodulator", "connection_point": "demodulator output"}], "outputs": [{"line": "Digital data output", "connected_to": "DSP", "connection_point": "DSP input"}]}

DSP.description: {"component": "DSP", "inputs": [{"line": "Digital signal from A/D", "connected_to": "A/D", "connection_point": "Digital Output"}], "outputs": [{"line": "Digital signal to D/A", "connected_to": "D/A", "connection_point": "Digital Input"}]}

D/A converter.description: {"component": "D/A converter", "inputs": [{"line": "Input 1", "connected_to": "DSP", "connection_point": "Digital output pin"}], "outputs": [{"line": "Output 1", "connected_to": "Actuator Driver", "connection_point": "Analog input pin"}]}

actuator driver.description: {"component": "actuator driver", "inputs": [{"line": "Input 1", "connected_to": "D/A", "connection_point": "Analog output pin"}], "outputs": [{"line": "Output 1", "connected_to": "Actuator coil", "connection_point": "Drive output terminals"}]}

DSM.description: {"component": "DSM", "inputs": [{"line": "FCW", "connected_to": "FCW (frequency command word source)", "connection_point": "FCW input pin on DSM"}, {"line": "f_DSM feedback", "connected_to": "DMD", "connection_point": "f_DSM output feedback pin on DSM"}], "outputs": [{"line": "MC", "connected_to": "DMD", "connection_point": "MC input pin on DMD"}]}

DCO (Digitally Controlled Oscillator).description: {"component": "DCO (Digitally Controlled Oscillator)", "inputs": [], "outputs": [{"line": "VOUT", "connected_to": "/2 Divider", "connection_point": "Input of the ÷2 block"}, {"line": "VOUTB", "connected_to": "/2 Divider", "connection_point": "Input of the ÷2 block"}]}

/2 Divider.description: {"component": "/2 Divider", "inputs": [{"line": "VOUT", "connected_to": "DCO", "connection_point": "VOUT output"}, {"line": "VOUTB", "connected_to": "DCO", "connection_point": "VOUTB output"}], "outputs": [{"line": "F_CCO_DIV", "connected_to": "18-bit Counter", "connection_point": "frequency input"}, {"line": "RST_CNT", "connected_to": "18-bit Counter", "connection_point": "RESET input"}, {"line": "MSK_CNT", "connected_to": "Digital Phase Detector & Calculator", "connection_point": "MSK_CNT input"}]}

Reference Divider.description: {"component": "Reference Divider", "inputs": [{"line": "REF_CLK", "connected_to": "External reference clock source", "connection_point": "REF_CLK input"}, {"line": "REF_DIV_SEL<2:0>", "connected_to": "Control logic / selection register", "connection_point": "REF_DIV_SEL pins"}, {"line": "RESET", "connected_to": "System Reset Controller", "connection_point": "RESET input"}], "outputs": [{"line": "COM_CLK", "connected_to": "Digital Phase Detector & Calculator", "connection_point": "COM_CLK input"}, {"line": "DEN_CLK", "connected_to": "MUX", "connection_point": "DEN_CLK input"}, {"line": "RST_CNT", "connected_to": "18-bit Counter", "connection_point": "RESET pin"}, {"line": "MSK_CNT", "connected_to": "18-bit Counter", "connection_point": "MSK_CNT pin"}]}

18-bit Counter.description: {"component": "18-bit Counter", "inputs": [{"line": "Fco_DIV", "connected_to": "/2 divider", "connection_point": "Fco_DIV output"}, {"line": "RST_CNT", "connected_to": "Reference Divider", "connection_point": "RST_CNT output"}, {"line": "MSK_CNT", "connected_to": "Reference Divider", "connection_point": "MSK_CNT output"}, {"line": "RESET", "connected_to": "Global Reset", "connection_point": "RESET input"}], "outputs": [{"line": "DCO_CNT<17:0>", "connected_to": "Digital Phase Detector & Calculator", "connection_point": "DCO_CNT<17:0> input"}]}

Digital Phase Detector & Calculator.description: {"component": "Digital Phase Detector & Calculator", "inputs": [{"line": "COM_CLK", "connected_to": "Reference Divider", "connection_point": "COM_CLK output"}, {"line": "DCO_CNT<17:0>", "connected_to": "18-bit Counter", "connection_point": "DCO_CNT<17:0> output"}, {"line": "RESET", "connected_to": "Global Reset", "connection_point": "RESET input"}], "outputs": [{"line": "UP/DN", "connected_to": "Tuning Controller", "connection_point": "UP/DN input"}, {"line": "COMP_REF<17:0>", "connected_to": "MUX", "connection_point": "COMP_REF<17:0> input"}]}

Tuning Controller.description: {"component": "Tuning Controller", "inputs": [{"line": "UP/DN", "connected_to": "Digital Phase Detector & Calculator", "connection_point": "UP/DN"}, {"line": "RESET", "connected_to": "External Reset Signal", "connection_point": "RESET"}], "outputs": [{"line": "RESET", "connected_to": "18-bit Counter", "connection_point": "RESET"}, {"line": "RESET", "connected_to": "Digital Phase Detector & Calculator", "connection_point": "RESET"}, {"line": "FLL_LOCK", "connected_to": "System Control Logic", "connection_point": "FLL_LOCK"}]}

Multiplexer (MUX).description: {"component": "Multiplexer (MUX)", "inputs": [{"line": "COMP_REF<17:0>", "connected_to": "Digital Phase Detector & Calculator", "connection_point": "COMP_REF<17:0> output"}, {"line": "INT_REF<17:0>", "connected_to": "FCW Map Table", "connection_point": "INT_REF<17:0> output"}, {"line": "EXT_REF<17:0>", "connected_to": "External Reference Input", "connection_point": "EXT_REF<17:0> bus"}, {"line": "EXT_COMP_EN", "connected_to": "External Comparator Enable Control", "connection_point": "EXT_COMP_EN signal"}], "outputs": [{"line": "DEN_CLK", "connected_to": "Digital Phase Detector & Calculator", "connection_point": "DEN_CLK input"}]}

Differential Stage.description: {"component": "Differential Stage", "inputs": [{"line": "V2", "connected_to": "Voltage source V2", "connection_point": "Non-inverting input terminal"}, {"line": "V1", "connected_to": "Voltage source V1", "connection_point": "Inverting input terminal"}, {"line": "Compensation feedback", "connected_to": "Compensation Circuitry", "connection_point": "Feedback input pin"}, {"line": "Biasing feedback", "connected_to": "Biasing Circuit", "connection_point": "Feedback input pin"}], "outputs": [{"line": "Differential output", "connected_to": "High gain Stage", "connection_point": "Input pin"}, {"line": "Error signal", "connected_to": "Compensation Circuitry", "connection_point": "Compensation input pin"}]}

High gain Stage.description: {"component": "High gain Stage", "inputs": [{"line": "Input 1", "connected_to": "Differential Stage", "connection_point": "Differential Stage output"}, {"line": "Input 2", "connected_to": "Compensation Circuitry", "connection_point": "Compensation output"}, {"line": "Input 3", "connected_to": "Biasing Circuit", "connection_point": "Biasing output"}], "outputs": [{"line": "Output 1", "connected_to": "Compensation Circuitry", "connection_point": "Compensation input"}, {"line": "Output 2", "connected_to": "Vout", "connection_point": "Vout"}]}

Compensation Circuitry.description: {"component": "Compensation Circuitry", "inputs": [{"line": "Input 1", "connected_to": "Differential Stage", "connection_point": "upper output node of Differential Stage"}, {"line": "Input 2", "connected_to": "Differential Stage", "connection_point": "primary output pin (right side) of Differential Stage"}], "outputs": [{"line": "Output 1", "connected_to": "High gain Stage", "connection_point": "compensation input pin (top side) of High gain Stage"}]}

Biasing Circuit.description: {"component": "Biasing Circuit", "inputs": [], "outputs": [{"line": "Bias line to Differential Stage", "connected_to": "Differential Stage", "connection_point": "Bias input node at bottom of Differential Stage"}, {"line": "Bias line to High Gain Stage", "connected_to": "High Gain Stage", "connection_point": "Bias input node at bottom of High Gain Stage"}]}

output Vout.description: {"component": "output Vout", "inputs": [{"line": "Input 1", "connected_to": "High gain Stage", "connection_point": "Vout pin"}], "outputs": [{"line": "Output 1", "connected_to": "External circuitry", "connection_point": "Vout node"}]}

START STOP LOGIC.description: {"component": "START STOP LOGIC", "inputs": [{"line": "SCL", "connected_to": "SCL bus line", "connection_point": "SCL input pin"}, {"line": "SDA", "connected_to": "SDA bus line", "connection_point": "SDA input pin"}], "outputs": [{"line": "START/STOP", "connected_to": "SERIAL CONTROL LOGIC", "connection_point": "START/STOP control input"}]}

SERIAL CONTROL LOGIC.description: {"component": "SERIAL CONTROL LOGIC", "inputs": [{"line": "VCC", "connected_to": "Power source", "connection_point": "VCC pin"}, {"line": "START/STOP", "connected_to": "START STOP LOGIC", "connection_point": "START/STOP output"}, {"line": "SDA", "connected_to": "SDA bus", "connection_point": "SDA pin"}, {"line": "COMP", "connected_to": "DEVICE ADDRESS COMPARATOR", "connection_point": "COMP output"}], "outputs": [{"line": "EN", "connected_to": "H.V. PUMP/TIMING", "connection_point": "EN input"}, {"line": "LOAD", "connected_to": "DATA WORD ADDR/COUNTER", "connection_point": "LOAD pin"}, {"line": "INC", "connected_to": "DATA WORD ADDR/COUNTER", "connection_point": "INC pin"}]}

H.V. PUMP/TIMING.description: {"component": "H.V. PUMP/TIMING", "inputs": [{"line": "EN", "connected_to": "Serial Control Logic", "connection_point": "EN output"}], "outputs": [{"line": "High-voltage output", "connected_to": "Data Recovery", "connection_point": "HV input"}]}

DEVICE ADDRESS COMPARATOR.description: {"component": "DEVICE ADDRESS COMPARATOR", "inputs": [{"line": "SDA", "connected_to": "Serial Data Line", "connection_point": "SDA pin"}, {"line": "LOAD", "connected_to": "START STOP LOGIC", "connection_point": "LOAD output"}, {"line": "A2", "connected_to": "External Address Pin", "connection_point": "A2 pin"}, {"line": "A1", "connected_to": "External Address Pin", "connection_point": "A1 pin"}, {"line": "A0", "connected_to": "External Address Pin", "connection_point": "A0 pin"}], "outputs": [{"line": "COMP", "connected_to": "SERIAL CONTROL LOGIC", "connection_point": "COMP input"}]}

DATA WORD ADDR/COUNTER.description: {"component": "DATA WORD ADDR/COUNTER", "inputs": [{"line": "R/W", "connected_to": "Device Address Comparator", "connection_point": "R/W output"}, {"line": "LOAD", "connected_to": "Device Address Comparator", "connection_point": "LOAD output"}, {"line": "LOAD", "connected_to": "Serial Control Logic", "connection_point": "LOAD output"}, {"line": "INC", "connected_to": "Serial Control Logic", "connection_point": "INC output"}], "outputs": [{"line": "X address bus", "connected_to": "X DEC", "connection_point": "X DEC input"}, {"line": "Y address bus", "connected_to": "Y DEC", "connection_point": "Y DEC input"}]}

X DEC.description: {"component": "X DEC", "inputs": [{"line": "Address bus", "connected_to": "Data Word Addr/Counter", "connection_point": "Word address output"}], "outputs": [{"line": "Word line selection", "connected_to": "EEPROM cell array", "connection_point": "Word line inputs"}]}

Y DEC.description: {"component": "Y DEC", "inputs": [{"line": "Address Bus A[2:0]", "connected_to": "Data Word Addr/Counter", "connection_point": "A2-A0 address outputs"}], "outputs": [{"line": "Column Enable Lines Y[7:0]", "connected_to": "Serial MUX", "connection_point": "Y decoder select inputs"}]}

DATA RECOVERY.description: {"component": "DATA RECOVERY", "inputs": [{"line": "H.V. Pump/Timing Output", "connected_to": "H.V. PUMP/TIMING", "connection_point": "Output to Data Recovery"}, {"line": "X_DEC", "connected_to": "X DEC", "connection_point": "X decoder output"}], "outputs": [{"line": "Serial Data", "connected_to": "SERIAL MUX", "connection_point": "Input of Serial MUX"}]}

SERIAL MUX.description: {"component": "SERIAL MUX", "inputs": [{"line": "X DEC", "connected_to": "Data Recovery (EEPROM)", "connection_point": "X DEC output"}, {"line": "Y DEC", "connected_to": "Y DEC", "connection_point": "Y DEC output"}], "outputs": [{"line": "D_OUT", "connected_to": "D_OUT/ACK LOGIC", "connection_point": "D_OUT bus input"}]}

DOUT/ACK LOGIC.description: {"component": "DOUT/ACK LOGIC", "inputs": [{"line": "Input 1", "connected_to": "Serial MUX", "connection_point": "Parallel data bus outputs (D0–D7) from Serial MUX"}, {"line": "Input 2", "connected_to": "Serial Control Logic", "connection_point": "ACK control signal output"}, {"line": "Input 3", "connected_to": "I2C bus", "connection_point": "SCL clock input"}], "outputs": [{"line": "Output 1", "connected_to": "External SDA line", "connection_point": "D_OUT pin"}]}

EEPROM.description: {"component": "EEPROM", "inputs": [{"line": "VCC", "connected_to": "Power Supply", "connection_point": "VCC pin"}, {"line": "GND", "connected_to": "Ground", "connection_point": "GND pin"}, {"line": "WP", "connected_to": "Write Protect Control", "connection_point": "WP pin"}, {"line": "SCL", "connected_to": "START/STOP LOGIC → SERIAL CONTROL LOGIC", "connection_point": "SCL pin"}, {"line": "SDA", "connected_to": "START/STOP LOGIC → SERIAL CONTROL LOGIC", "connection_point": "SDA pin"}], "outputs": [{"line": "SDA", "connected_to": "START/STOP LOGIC → SERIAL CONTROL LOGIC", "connection_point": "SDA pin"}]}

Duty Cycle Controller.description: {"component": "Duty Cycle Controller", "inputs": [{"line": "10-MHz REF", "connected_to": "External reference clock source", "connection_point": "REF input"}], "outputs": [{"line": "DCCLK", "connected_to": "Retiming and Counter block", "connection_point": "Clock input"}, {"line": "DCEN", "connected_to": "Floor comparator", "connection_point": "Enable input"}]}

Counter.description: {"component": "Counter", "inputs": [{"line": "CKV (gated by DCCLK)", "connected_to": "AND gate", "connection_point": "output"}], "outputs": [{"line": "CNT", "connected_to": "DFF producing C0", "connection_point": "D input"}, {"line": "CNT", "connected_to": "DFF producing C1", "connection_point": "D input"}]}

Retiming.description: {"component": "Retiming", "inputs": [{"line": "Gated CKV", "connected_to": "Logic gate combining CKV and DCCLK", "connection_point": "Output of the gating logic"}], "outputs": [{"line": "DCFD", "connected_to": "Duty Cycle Controller", "connection_point": "DCFD input"}]}

DFF.description: {"component": "DFF", "inputs": [{"line": "CNT", "connected_to": "Counter", "connection_point": "CNT output"}, {"line": "CKV (retimed)", "connected_to": "Retiming block", "connection_point": "Retiming output"}], "outputs": [{"line": "C0", "connected_to": "XOR gate", "connection_point": "first XOR input"}, {"line": "C1", "connected_to": "XOR gate", "connection_point": "second XOR input"}]}

Floor.description: {"component": "Floor", "inputs": [{"line": "C1-C0", "connected_to": "Adder (C1 minus C0)", "connection_point": "Adder output"}, {"line": "4*FCW", "connected_to": "DSM-based Controller", "connection_point": "FCW output (scaled by 4)"}], "outputs": [{"line": "Floor output", "connected_to": "Comparator", "connection_point": "Data input of comparator"}]}

FE.description: {"component": "FE", "inputs": [{"line": "Input 1", "connected_to": "Floor", "connection_point": "output"}, {"line": "Input 2", "connected_to": "C1-C0 Subtractor", "connection_point": "C1-C0 output"}, {"line": "Input 3", "connected_to": "Duty Cycle Controller", "connection_point": "DCEN"}], "outputs": [{"line": "Output 1", "connected_to": "State Machine", "connection_point": "FE input"}]}

State Machine.description: {"component": "State Machine", "inputs": [{"line": "REF", "connected_to": "10-MHz REF oscillator", "connection_point": "REF output"}, {"line": "FE", "connected_to": "DCFD front-end comparator", "connection_point": "FE output"}], "outputs": [{"line": "EN", "connected_to": "Switching Feedback MUX", "connection_point": "EN control pin"}]}

8bit Truncated CS-DTC.description: {"component": "8bit Truncated CS-DTC", "inputs": [{"line": "Input 1", "connected_to": "10-MHz REF source", "connection_point": "REF input pin"}, {"line": "Input 2", "connected_to": "DTC Gain Calibration block", "connection_point": "Calibration interface"}], "outputs": [{"line": "Output 1", "connected_to": "Sampler and PFD", "connection_point": "REFA output node"}, {"line": "Output 2", "connected_to": "DSM-based Controller", "connection_point": "8-bit DTC code output"}]}

4bit TDC.description: {"component": "4bit TDC", "inputs": [{"line": "REFB", "connected_to": "Switching Feedback MUX", "connection_point": "MUX output labeled REFB"}, {"line": "FB", "connected_to": "DCO feedback divider", "connection_point": "Divider output labeled FB"}], "outputs": [{"line": "TDC digital output", "connected_to": "Digital Loop Filter (DLF)", "connection_point": "DLF input"}]}

DLF.description: {"component": "DLF", "inputs": [{"line": "Coarse TDC Output", "connected_to": "Coarse TDC", "connection_point": "11-bit digital output bus"}, {"line": "4-bit TDC Output", "connected_to": "4bit TDC", "connection_point": "4-bit digital output bus"}], "outputs": [{"line": "Coarse Control Word", "connected_to": "Transformer-based stacked-gm DCO", "connection_point": "Coarse tuning port (11-bit input)"}, {"line": "Fine Control Word", "connected_to": "Transformer-based stacked-gm DCO", "connection_point": "Fine tuning port (9-bit input)"}]}

Transformer-based Stacked-gm DCO.description: {"component": "Transformer-based Stacked-gm DCO", "inputs": [{"line": "Coarse tuning code (11 bit)", "connected_to": "Coarse DLF", "connection_point": "Coarse code input"}, {"line": "Fine tuning code (9 bit)", "connected_to": "Fine DLF", "connection_point": "Fine code input"}], "outputs": [{"line": "CKV", "connected_to": "DCFD block", "connection_point": "CKV input (Retiming)"}, {"line": "CKV", "connected_to": "Multi-Modulus Divider (MMD)", "connection_point": "CKG input"}]}

PFD.description: {"component": "PFD", "inputs": [{"line": "Input 1", "connected_to": "8bit Truncated CS-DTC", "connection_point": "REFA output pin"}, {"line": "Input 2", "connected_to": "Transformer-based Stacked-gm DCO", "connection_point": "CKV output pin"}], "outputs": [{"line": "Output 1", "connected_to": "OR gate and Coarse TDC", "connection_point": "Up pulse output pin (feeds OR gate input and CKG input of Coarse TDC)"}, {"line": "Output 2", "connected_to": "OR gate and Coarse TDC", "connection_point": "Down pulse output pin (feeds OR gate input and CKG input of Coarse TDC)"}]}

OR gate.description: {"component": "OR gate", "inputs": [{"line": "UP", "connected_to": "PFD", "connection_point": "UP output pin"}, {"line": "DOWN", "connected_to": "PFD", "connection_point": "DOWN output pin"}], "outputs": [{"line": "OR_OUT", "connected_to": "DZ Delay", "connection_point": "input pin"}, {"line": "OR_OUT", "connected_to": "AND gate", "connection_point": "input pin"}]}

DZ Delay.description: {"component": "DZ Delay", "inputs": [{"line": "Input 1", "connected_to": "OR gate (merges PFD UP and DOWN)", "connection_point": "output of OR gate"}], "outputs": [{"line": "Output 1", "connected_to": "AND gate", "connection_point": "input of AND gate generating ODZ"}]}

AND gate.description: {"component": "AND gate", "inputs": [{"line": "DCEN", "connected_to": "Duty Cycle Controller", "connection_point": "DCEN output"}, {"line": "CKV", "connected_to": "Transformer-based Stacked-gm DCO feedback buffer", "connection_point": "CKV pin"}], "outputs": [{"line": "Count Enable", "connected_to": "Counter", "connection_point": "enable input"}, {"line": "Gate Output", "connected_to": "Retiming block", "connection_point": "retiming input"}]}

Coarse TDC.description: {"component": "Coarse TDC", "inputs": [{"line": "Phase error pulse", "connected_to": "PFD", "connection_point": "PFD output"}, {"line": "CKG", "connected_to": "MMD (Switching Feedback)", "connection_point": "CKG input"}], "outputs": [{"line": "Coarse code (11bit)", "connected_to": "Digital Loop Filter (DLF)", "connection_point": "DLF Coarse input"}]}

Sampler.description: {"component": "Sampler", "inputs": [{"line": "Selected feedback signal", "connected_to": "MUX", "connection_point": "Output"}], "outputs": [{"line": "Sampled feedback signal", "connected_to": "8bit Truncated CS-DTC", "connection_point": "REFA input"}]}

MUX.description: {"component": "MUX", "inputs": [{"line": "REFA", "connected_to": "8bit Truncated CS-DTC", "connection_point": "REFA output pin"}, {"line": "DIV", "connected_to": "MMD (Multi-Modulus Divider)", "connection_point": "DIV output pin"}, {"line": "EN", "connected_to": "State Machine", "connection_point": "EN select input"}], "outputs": [{"line": "MUX_OUT", "connected_to": "Sampler", "connection_point": "Sampler input pin"}]}

DSM-based Controller.description: {"component": "DSM-based Controller", "inputs": [{"line": "FCW", "connected_to": "Digital Loop Filter (DLF) output", "connection_point": "FCW input port"}, {"line": "DTC Code (8bit)", "connected_to": "8bit Truncated CS-DTC", "connection_point": "DTC Code input port"}], "outputs": [{"line": "9bit", "connected_to": "MMD", "connection_point": "Data input bus"}]}
